title: Bakersfield Unplugged
description: Tune into live acoustics on the Prairie Fire rooftop every Thursday from 7pm - 10pm starting March 1st. Sip on drinks while you listen to your favorite local artists.

banner_image.alt: Bakersfield Unplugged at The Padre Hotel
